title: Server Side JavaScript Hack Night
details:
Details
-------

Hey friends! Last time we met up it was supposed to be a hack night, but it sort of devolved into a pub night of sorts. This time will be a hack night. Let's do some server side JavaScript together. Hack on some [Node.js](http://Node.js), Ringo, or what have you. I'd suggest trying to port one of your favourite libraries from another language into JavaScript to start, and perhaps pair with a friend.
